==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Sasani:''' So this is... my senior's masterpiece...
:{{DIcon}} Senior?
::'''Sasani:''' Yes, the one who designed this masterpiece is my senior.
::'''Sasani:''' But it is a pity that Mr. [[Kaveh]] graduated before I was even admitted.
::'''Sasani:''' So, I didn't have the honour to even speak with him in person, and I've never even attended a single architectural elective taught by him.
::'''Sasani:''' Hmm... Mr. Kaveh is so great. I'm sure he has gained both fame and fortune, holding an important position somewhere in the world...
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Sasani:''' When... will I...
{{Dialogue End}}
